title: Molly-Mae Hague gets bloodied up for Halloween as morphs into a sexy zombie
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Molly-Mae Hague has gone from Love Island to gore island - smearing herself with fake blood ready for Halloween .

The influencer, 20, dressed up as a "scary" Zara Croft zombie as part of a PrettyLittleThing makeup and outfit tutorial video for Instagram .

She sported an underboob crop top with a black harness body choker and matching black tight shorts.

The star accessorised with suspender style straps around her thighs and lots of chains in her pockets.

Love Island star Molly-Mae swapped her usual neutral makeup for shocking pink eyes and dark contour, adding fake blood to her face, and veins under her eyes.

She was pampered by makeup artists and hairdressers who styled her hair in a rope plait instead of her everyday platinum blonde loose waves.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The star has recently been experimenting with new looks.

She recently took to Instagram to share a photo of her wild, crimped hairstyle.

The social media influencer changed things up from her usual straight and sleek hairdo in opt of a tousled curly crimp style as she promoted her latest venture with Beauty Works.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She captioned the stunning snap posted on Thursday: "Me and my lions mane."

Molly's impeccable hair extensions were a hot talking point throughout her time on Love Island this summer, as girls across the nation attempted to recreate how she styled her long luscious locks.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Whether she scraped her hair back into her now-famous bun or let her platinum blonde extensions fall around her shoulders in perfectly blow-dried waves, her hair was highly enviable.

One user commented on her freshly crimped hair: "It's not fair how you can pull off literally any hairstyle."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Another replied: "This hair!" followed by a lion and heart emoji.

Others responded: "Love this hairstyle on you!"

"OMG hair!!" followed by lots of heart eyes emojis.
description: She's swapped full-glam for dark makeup and scary outfits
